questions.question: A circular plate of diameter 3.4m is below 2m of free surface of the water in such a way that it is making an angle of 41° with the free surface. Find the position of centre of pressure. Refer figure in the simulator.

A circular plate of diameter 2.6m is below 1.8m of free surface of the water in such a way that it is making an angle of 44° with the free surface. Find the position of centre of pressure. Refer figure in the simulator.
